name: UXP Flatsome Gallery
author: UXPlugin.com

sections.description:
Customizable Flatsome Gallery
– Watch Video in Gallery
– Watch more Videos in Gallery
– Categorize photo Galleries on page addons
– Demo link: https://demo.uxplugin.com/plugins/uxp-flatsome-gallery/
Donate link: https://paypal.me/nghaloc
Pro version please contact Facebook: https://fb.com/nghaloc – Email : nghaloc@gmail.com
Thank for using.
sections.installation:
1. Upload contents of the plugin zip file to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. In Admin Page: Flatsome > Theme Options > Style > Image Lightbox > uncheck “Enable Flatsome Lightbox” > Save
  4. Add Element Gallery in UX Builder
    DONE
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Optimize Class name “Loader”: to avoid conflicts
  • Remove class ux-lightbox
  • Optimize Magnific Popup
  • Minify js

1.0.0

  • Initial version
  • Change class open-video to ux-video
  • Change class image-lightbox, lightbox-gallery to ux-lightbox
